程序包 frogger.service

枚举 SceneSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SceneSwitch>
      • frogger.service.SceneSwitch
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SceneSwitch>
    public enum SceneSwitch
extends java.lang.Enum<SceneSwitch>

    SceneSwitch

    The SceneSwitch class is an singleton class of utility to provide some methods to switch between different scenes in the primary Stage (getPrimaryStage()). Moreover, this class also create a new instructionStage(getInstructionStage()) to show the instruction.

    Note: this class is implemented as an Enum thus to be a singleton class.

    Main Functionality: 

                    SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToHome();
                SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToSelect();
                SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToGame(nickName, gameLevel);
                SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToInstruction();
                SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.switchToScoreList(gameStatus, Score);

    Use: 

                    SceneSwitch.INSTANCE.{METHOD}()
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    MusicPlayer, GameController, InstructionController, ScoreListController, SelectController, StartScreenController, PopupController

      • values

        public static SceneSwitch[] values()
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。该方法可用于迭代 常量, 如下所示: 
        for (SceneSwitch c : SceneSwitch.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        返回:
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序返回的包含这些常量的数组

      • valueOf

        public static SceneSwitch valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
        返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。 字符串必须与用于声明该类型的枚举常量的 标识符完全匹配。(不允许有多余 的空格字符。)
        参数:
        name - 要返回的枚举常量的名称。
        返回:
        返回带有指定名称的枚举常量
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 如果该枚举类型没有带有指定名称的常量
        java.lang.NullPointerException - 如果参数为空值

      • init

        public void init​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)

        Initializes the primaryStage of application based on the given Stage and create instructionStage and popoupStage using new Stage().

        参数:
        primaryStage - the primaryStage of application

      • switchToStartScreen

        public void switchToStartScreen()

        Switch the current scene to StartScreen

      • switchToGame

        public void switchToGame​(java.lang.String nickName,
                         java.lang.String gameLevel)

        Switch the current scene to game Page

        The GameView will changed depend on the gameLevel and this method also addEventHandler to scene and add CSS styleSheet.

        参数:
        nickName - The name of current player (passed from SelectController)
        gameLevel - The level; of current game (passed from SelectController);

      • switchToSelect

        public void switchToSelect()

        Switch the current scene to StartScreen

      • switchToInstruction

        public void switchToInstruction()

        Open the instruction stage

      • switchToPopup

        public void switchToPopup​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Score> popupScoreList)

        Open the Popup stage and transmit the current score list of each round to PopupController

        参数:
        popupScoreList - A temporary ArrayList store the high score of each round.

      • switchToScoreList

        public void switchToScoreList​(java.lang.String status,
                              Score score)

        Switch the current scene to ScoreList

        Show the different image of game status and play different music depend on status parameters and show the score of this currentGame

        参数:
        status - status == "Win" if game victory, == "Lose" if game defeat (passed from GameController.handleGameEnd())
        score - The score of currentGame (passed from GameController.handleGameEnd()

      • exitProgram

        public void exitProgram()
        Exit the application

        返回:
        the primary stage of the application

        the instruction stage of the application

      • getPopupStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getPopupStage()

        the popup stage of the application
